transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, good morning sir, Parlo sir.
Customer: Aare aano, mansilaayilla.
Executive: Sir, Kitson from IndiaMART sir. Sir vilichayirunnu raavile, ippozhum vilichayirunnu.
Customer: Aa vilichirunnu.
Executive: Aa paranjolu sir, enthu patti? Enthengilum issue undo sir?
Customer: Onnum pattiyilla, onnum pattiyilla, athukondaa vilichathu.
Executive: Oh okay okay.
Customer: Sir vilichappo njaan edukkan pattiilla, njaan purathaanu, ithuvare officilum poyittilla.
Executive: Alla, athu mathi. Ingine kooduthal kooduthal customersine ingine sangadippichittu ningalude kaaryangal maathram nadannaal mathi. Customersinte kaaryam enthaayaalum aayikkotte. Athil orotta lead illallo, orotta lead.
Executive: Lead onnum illennu paranjaal.
Customer: Ingottu ayakkunnundu, 20 we are enna selected specially for you 20 leads ennu paranjonnu. Oru otte oronam athinakathu undengil potte. Keralathile polum oronam illa athinakathu.
Executive: Okay sir, past leadsine check cheythaayirunno? Namukku vannirikkunna leadsine?
Customer: Ellam cheythu. Ini athonnum paranjittu kaaryamilla, onnumilla yaathaayittu.
Executive: Okay sir, actually saarinte profile ippo ente kayilalla.
Customer: Saari kayil aayikkotte, aalude kayil aayikkotte, enikku aa pole Kitson enna oru vyakthiyale maathrame ariyathullu.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Njaan kazhinja varsham athu venda ennu vechirunnu saadhanam. Ningal additional ithum koode cheythu vere ethandokke cheythu ingine ithu othiri varum ennu paranjondu.
Customer: Kazhinja varsham enikku thonnunnu ithil kooduthal mechom undaayirunnu.
Customer: Ithora okkeyaayirunnu, ithokkeyaayirunnu. Ennitte kazhinja divasam veroru pulli vilichu ingottu vannu njaan backend manager aanu.
Customer: Enniri paranjittenthuvaa, incognito windowil open cheythittu ningal search cheythaal mathi kaanaavunnu.
Executive: Eavide? Saitinte peru vallam paranjayirunno? Eathu saitilaa avaru search cheyyande ennathullathu enthengilum paranjayirunno sir?
Customer: Trade.indiamart.com.
Executive: Trade.indiamart. Okay okay.
Customer: Athil sir search cheythittum kittiillello?
Customer: Illa illa ippozhum njaan search cheythu vechirikkuvaa.
Executive: Okay. So athil namukku relevant aayitta lead onnum varunnilla alle?
Customer: Enikku thonnunnu saare nammude keywords entho, keyword entho mismatchingil irikkuvaanennaa thonnunne. Njaan oru kaaryam cheyyaam saare njaan ippo.
Customer: Leadsil generate cheyyunnathu set, athinakathu enthu keyword maaraan?
Executive: Chelappo athu internal softwareil chelappo mismatching undaavum sir. Ee primary productil add cheyyumbothekkine atleast oru moonu keyword primary.
Customer: Ithu vishwasichu irangi kazhinjitte ithu onnumillaatha oru sthithi vannu kazhinjaal kazhinja varshathekaal moshamaayippoyi.
Executive: Sir njaan nokkaam sir, kuzhappamilla njaan. Enthengilum enthengilum okke kazhinja varsham kittuvaayirunnu. Potte athu nammude velayude vyathyaasathilo enthengilum okke vannaal namukkathu potte nashtappettathu irikkum. Ithu enquiryye illa.
Customer: Athu mansilaayi sir, mansilaayi.
Executive: Sir namukku TrustSeal eduthathinu shesham second monthil saarinu drastic aayittulla oru visibility and increase ellam undaayirunnu. Saar thanne paranjille ethrayo enquiry engilum varunnundennu vannirunnu. So athinu shesham onnum vannirunnilla.
Executive: Okay, athinennu vechu kazhinjaal saar saarinte profile handle cheyyunnathu veroru expert team aanu. TrustSealinte expert team aanu handle cheyyunnathu. So njaan enthaanalum saarinte profile onnu njaan check cheythittu athinte keyword enthengilum mismatching undo ennu njaan aadyam check cheyyatte. Ippo ente saarinte profile ente kayil illaathathukondaannu saarinte status enikku clear aayittu mansilaavaathathu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Njaan njaan nokkiyittu enthaanalum saarine njaan update cheyyaam. Ippo oru lead polum namukku proper aayittu kittunnilla ennullathaanu. Enikku athayathu leads varunnilla ennaano enquiry varunnilla ennaano sir?
Customer: Leads ennu njaan paranjille ippo kazhinja njaaraazhcha vannu 20 leads successfulli you are selected you ennakke paranjittu. Athinakathu oronnu polum keralathile oru lead illa.
Executive: Okay okay okay sir okay. So saaru paranja pole nammal naalu district maathramaanallo nammal deal cheyyunnathu alle?
Customer: Athe. Ippozhu keralathile oru lead illengil enthu cheyyum?
Executive: Mansilaayi sir. Njaan athu nokkatte. Athilu saarinu ippo in case athinakathu keyword enthengilum mismatch undengil njaan athu rectify cheythu njaan primary productilottu maatti thannekkam. Anganeyalla primary productil thanneyaanu saarinte keyword ellam matchingil correct aayittu ullathu ennundengil ente sideil ninnu njaanoru test terminal ente sideil ninnu cheyyaan pattunnilla. Kaaranam saarinte profile ippo ente kayil illaathathukondu enteyinnu test terminal raise cheyyaan pattathilla. Saarinte account managerinte aduthu njaan discuss cheythittu test terminal njaan raise cheyyaam. Appo saarinte cataloginte kaaryangal ellam head officil share aavum. Avideyinnu enthaa prashnam ennathullathu check cheythittu sort out cheyyaan vendiittu njaan nokkaam sir. Enthengilum undengil vilichaal mathi. Njaan ee randu divasamaayittu officil poyillaayirunnu. Athukondaa njaan pinne saarinu phone edukkaanenne. Njaanoru functionil aayirunnu.
Customer: Okay okay okay sheri namaskaram.
Executive: Sheri sir enthengilum undengil vilichaal mathi njaan ippo saarinte profile onnu nokkatte.
Customer: Okay sheri.
Executive: Njaanoru oru mani aavumbothekkine njaan officil pokum. Appo appo nokkiyittu njaan saarine vilichaal mathiyo sir?
Customer: Aa mathi mathi mathi sir.
Executive: Sheri sir sheri njaan nokki. Sheri okay.
Executive: Okay thank you sir bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant leads from Kerala.

- Feels current leads are worse than last year.

- No leads from Kerala despite TrustSeal subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive will check profile for keyword mismatches.

- Will rectify keywords and update primary product.

- Will discuss with account manager to raise test terminal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking profile.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, keywords, profile, indiamart
